thread.title: Franklin First Financial Ltd. Names Christa Kusler as New Regional Manager
thread.title_full: Franklin First Financial Ltd. Names Christa Kusler as New Regional Manager

title: Franklin First Financial Ltd. Names Christa Kusler as New Regional Manager
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Franklin First Financial Ltd. Names Christa Kusler as New Regional Manager Franklin First Financial Ltd. has named Christa Kusler as the regional manager of its newest location in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. PHILADELPHIA, PA, August 05,   Franklin First Financial Ltd. has named Christa Kusler as the regional manager of its newest location in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Kusler brings 20 years of experience in the mortgage business to her new role and will be serving Pennsylvania, Delaware, Southern NJ Maryland, Virginia, North Carolina and South Carolina. Previously, she was a branch manager at United Northern Mortgage Bankers Ltd. "I am excited to have recently joined the team." Kusler commented "Over the last couple years I've expanded my footprint outside my local area and developed relationships in NC, NY and NJ just to name a few. This new opportunity with Franklin First gives me the ability to continue to grow the regional market. From the first day I met with the staff at Franklin, they made me feel like part of their family. I am happy to be a part of the team." National Marketing Director Heidi Frigano added "The addition of Christa Kusler has been more than we expected. We couldn't be more pleased. We are very excited to have her join our team. She brings a tremendous amount of knowledge, drive and passion to this position."Franklin First Financial is a nationwide, full-service mortgage banker dedicated to offering quality mortgage solutions with an unwavering commitment to customer service. Whether for the purchase of a home or a refinance, we have the loan products to meet the needs of most borrowers. With over 20 years experience in the mortgage industry, we understand what's important. Our friendly and experienced mortgage consultants are always available to service your mortgage needs. Call us today to find out how we can help you finance your dreams. We believe in building strong, trusting relationships with our clients, which lead to higher volume of closed loans. Our reputation relies on exceeding your expectations. Franklin First Financial is a nationwide mortgage banker. Licensed in 39 states with over 20 years of experience, we're one of America's fastest growing and best managed mortgage banks. # # #
